Content: Best free music app on Android. I started using that app about 4 years ago. It never crashed on any of my phones. I tried 3 other apps, but always came back to this one. The only thing I'd like to see added to the app is to be able to listen to the music in my Google Drive.

I do love shuttle I REALLY DO, BUT ITS GETTING ON MY NERVES. THE UPDATES MADE IT EVEN WORSE. NOW IT CRASHES EVERY TEN MINUTES!!!!! Please please do something about it. if this is not fixed I'mma uninstall this app.
Crashes when deleting a track. Not sure if anybody else has had this issue. Other than that, would be 5/5. 4/5 for now until that issue is fixed.
What a waste of money. I bought the paid version becouse I wanted to cast music to google chromecast and this useless app crashes each and very time I try to cast.
Sometimes it freezes. Otherwise it's great.
Constantly crashes in the middle of a song. Very annoying
Keeps crashing after update
App crashes kind of often and consistently deletes any playlists I try to make
Updates might have crashed it

Used of sort of be the best music player I could find so far; has the best organization options, auto loads artwork, quick lyric integration, etc. My original main complaint was you cannot add an album to Up Next, but since recent updates you can't actually use the "Up next " button at all for anything anymore unless you select your song via search (it's currently broken). Among other things, the "Recently Added" tab doesn't work correctly anymore, and deleting songs freezes up the app for about a minute, sometimes deletes the file, most of the time doesn't. It's a decent music app plagued by small issues that can easily be resolved.
App completely freezes phone. Used app for years and it was fine previously.
Works great most of the time, sometimes crashes
Sometines when i hit the home button, the music crashes along with it. Please fix this bug
This latest update has ruined one of the best android music apps around. Blacklist no longer works and the app keeps crashing
So much better than Google Play. Overall, it has pretty much everything I want for an offline music player. Slight skips when plugging in to charge phone, but doesn't crash like Play.
App is a little buggy (sometimes jumps tracks randomly and freezes) but on the whole, one of the better music players on the app store. I'm going to continue to use it.
My default music app bar none. Love the equalizer, it actually makes a difference, particularly with Bass. Crashing issues have been solved and now it works as good as it looks.
Keeps asking for permissions every single time and crashes after accepting the permission ..best useless app ever
App has a tendency of crashing after playing at least two tracks.
Keeps crashing when I open albums. Please look into it!
Favourite offline mp3 app. Found a small bug where the app will crash if I use Google Now voice commands to try to play a song, hopefully this can be fixed!

So far so good, after plenty of apps making music pause by itself I've found this nice app 👌. Love the Google assistant integration but some music titles seem to crash the app and have to ask Google assistant to play music in another type of way. Please fix this.
I can't create playlists. The app crashes everytime i try to do so.
Something's the app is stops playing music or it is crashing
Would be amazing if it wouldn't crash every time I try locking my phone..

It's an amazing app! They're on top of the crashes and fix them as soon as possible. The paid version gives you Chromecast, though it doesn't work fairly well (it has issues with connectivity, but it's still a nice concept).

+ delete song + equalizer + download album art sometime gives wrong artist-occasional freezes playback/widget buttons - blank album art on player but shows in sidebar/widget -random playback start/stop in background - no playback, shows 0:00

Search Broken
I never had a problem with this app since 2 updates ago, it was working flawlessly until then... At first, searching just got very specific, you have to type the exact name including brackets & everything (which I never had to do before)... Now when I try to search, it shows the entire library instead, making it useless, and if I search again, the app crashes.

Miles above the others, and no ads to boot. Used it for about a year after a friend recommended it. Haven't looked back since. Low utilization, clean UI, stable and crashless, doesn't have ads slowing down the UI. Would love to see a better rating system and bulk tag editor.

I loved the free version so much I decided to pay for it. Once that happened, the app started freezing and crashing constantly, making it unusable. No amount of app or phone restarts fixes the issue. I can't get a refund since I upgraded in the app. Lesson learned.
New update Along with the latest update the app started to crash occasionally. Additionally, the new search algorithm is really bad. It screws up in its job. 3 stars until the app is bug free.

My other favorite player! Love it. Just gave 4 stars due to some crashes happening randomly. Sometimes the player crashes and refuses to stop the music. And one other time I opened the app and it stopped working! Besides all of that it's one awesome music player!

Great Alternative to Default App I have a big flac music library and the default app would freeze up or slow down while browsing. Shuttle has had no issue with my collection so far. It also doesn't try to shoehorn me into music streaming. Works great with Chromecast! - A great alternative!
Shuffle is good... At crashing constantly and not doing basic functions. I am uninstalling this garbage.
Was perfectly good until it recently started crashing, not sure why if fixed 5 stars.
Keeps crashing. Fix up!
Amazing app but crashes when I use it with Google now
One of the best. Cool themes. Sometimes the app crashes.

Used to be fantastic, but Android 6 update broke it Shuttle used to be my to go music player, but ever since my phone updated to Android 6, it's been experiencing crashes and slowdowns. It's still usable, but no longer the seamless listening experience as before.

Works great... When it works
Freezes A LOT. Every time I want to change albums it goes full retard and I have to restart it to choose a different album. Music still plays, GUI freaks out and becomes unresponsive. I've used it for over a year with no complaints, this seems to be a recent problem. I switched to google music player. I hate it, the UI is awful, but it actually works !

Only one Problem
Nice app! I'm using it a while but the last month there is one little thing that is very annoying.. When I start a song manually it freezes on the 9th second and then I have to press twice the pause button so that it continues playing!! But the good news is that it doesn't have that bug on the next songs.. Only in the first one.
It used to work fine but too freezing or unresponsive with recent releases. Also picks artwork of different song even if option is to select embedded artwork. Crashes when using chrome.

Was good up until earlier today there was an upate. The app crashed it erased the shortcuts I had so I could see the music and just hit play or skip a song without completely opening the app. They removed the feature completely.

Not stable nor smooth Edit : my phone was the issue \\\\ The layout is nice and intuitive, I liked it a lot, but sometimes makes my redmi 1s phone crash completely, and the playback isn't always smooth.... I am disappointed

Great design, but some flaws
I wanted an alternative to Google Music for offline playback. Shuttle looked great, had similar and sometimes better functions (like getting album art). My problem though is that the app often crashes or freezes (especially on long tracks like podcasts). This is dissapointing as I paid for the app. I hope this can be improved but until then its hard to use because it only works half the time.
When it works its great. Tends to freeze slot when switching songs. Have to start it again. Might be because it can't handle too much songs in library.
Great, efficient music app Shuttle works great with minimal crashes. I love how it automatically finds album & artist images.
Crashes on all songs view
Started as a fantastic app, but spoiled recently Crashes on Amazon Fire 7, started to ask for money for different features, but is still quite unpolished.
Bug found After update app is constantly crashing. Please fix it.

Latest update widget problems Don't get me wrong, I really like this player, it's one of the best out there. But since the last update the widget has been crashing and doesn't display the current album art. I don't recommend updating to this version.

Super app but weird bug Thx for working on this great app, it is beautiful, fast, gets easily my artwork... It crashes a lot randomly on my device but I think it's not a common bug by reading the comments. + I'd like to put lyrics on songs without using software like Itunes, or merge duplicated albums.
Sometimes crashes while using tag editor. Add an option to enable album art in song list.
Crashes everytime I seem to use it Love the fact it doesnt replay songs on shuffle, but it crashes so frequently.
Good Very nice features and colour themes. It rarely ever crashes.What more could you ask for in a player?!

Add a custom color option for shuttle+. Deleted songs show up in most played and suggested song list. Add a buffer size adjustment option as the app sometimes lags for no reason at all. Sometimes atop crashes in folder tab
Good service but crashes occasionally On a Nextbit Robin. Occasionally crashes and requires a phone restart to work. Otherwise great.

Beautiful interface. This is what I've been looking for. Beautiful customizable interface, flawless playback, minimal crashing, easy to use, etc. I hope it stays on the market forever, the other apps don't come close to this.
I love the app and i cant deal without it but since the new update itfreezes then crashes all the time and it's so annoying, please fix this
Nope The app crashed and it deleted all of my songs from my favorites list. It crashes frequently and I have had enough.
Nice player. Crashes all the time on Samsung Galaxy s5
It's OK A good music app. Sometimes it automatically got crashed. this bug must be fixed.
Only problem is, it keeps crashing without reason, else, best music app

Totaly Irritated Now !! Once upon a time it was the best app which one can use for listening music. But after updating my Moto G3 to Android 6.0 the search fuction is not working and the player crashes eventually. Please fix this issue.

Love the app but constant crashes are an issue
This app is beautiful and far better designed than the Google music app. Artwork is downloaded automatically and has always been correct for me but is often low quality. My only issue is that I experience extremely frequent crashes if I use certain other apps while listening to music and occasional random crashes when I'm on the app itself. Love the app other than this.

Random crashes and a little slow
This music app is pretty awesome as you can design how you want it to look like and there are other functions that it has that other music apps don't really have. But one tiny little problem; it crashes sometimes out of the blue and sometimes it is a little too slow. The widget is not working very well either. Please fix!

Never Ending Crashes I seriously thought this was the best music player app in the store. Well actually I still do, but as of recently I can't seem to go on even 1 minute without it crashing. I've loved the player too much to move on to another player, please do something about the crashes.
Hangs and crashes a lott even after update Player plays songs in a real bad quality. Basss is majory affected. New updates have screwed it even more. Previos versions were really good.

App crashes constantly (Galaxy S5)
I have been using Shuttle for over a year, but for the past month it has been crashing constantly for me. Reinstalling the app fixed absolutely nothing. I try to select a song and it just freezes and crashes, and trying to reopen the app just results in a blank screen. I was honestly considering upgrading to the paid version, but not for an app that I can't even use anymore.

Awesome app. Nothing compares. Love the interface customability and it's simpleness. Its very responsive in almost all cases. I only had a couple of situations when my MP3 tags were not read properly for track sorting. And sometimes, if the phone is too busy you can have the player crashed.
App keeps crashing I love this app and this is the only music app I have ever used for so long. But I need you fix it asap! It keeps crashing every once in a while. Very annoying.
Long time user I've had this app since I got my Nexus 5 (3 years) and I must say I really enjoy it! Easy to use, almost never crashes, and organizes the music well and fast. I recommend this app 100%

Glitchy Freezes at random times (usually when picking a new song or using the next song button). Doesn't allow me to close the app when playing in background. Always have to force stop the app to close it.

No problems. I havent had a single problem with it so far. I enjoy the fact i can change the colors and themes and it responds fairly well. I dont think it has ever crashed on me either. The only thing i wish it could do was weed out duplicate files/songs. But its no big deal without that feature.

Great player. Its really good with exceptional layout and visuals. Also very good features in the suggested and most played. However the equaliser occasionally (sometimes too often) crashes just killing the vibe of a song.
Crashes too often One of the better players yet it crashes when playing a new song. Also album art sometimes glitches out and it shows the same art for multiple albums.

Great app Tho when u download new music u need to rescan library or restart app, and *sometimes* it crashes when u open another app that plays audio so u need to reopen. But besides that it's a great app.
Good app but glitches Multiple albums glitch and frequent crashes hold this music app back
Great Simple, plays music, eq functions. Crashes sometimes but patches keep it going
Crash when deny permission in setting When I play a song in Player activity, go to setting to deny storage permission then I go back to shuffle (via recent app), crash occurs
Still crashes "Major crash fixes" jkjkjk still crashes and tweaks all the time. Moving to a new app

Amazing player full customisation Love how the app let's me customise the look of it and it totally keeps to the minimalistic nature of Android. Not much crashes and it's been an amazing and simple experience
Cool app Everything works fine for me a little freeze here and there but nothing serious
NICEEE So much better than the default, BUT it has a tendency to crash sometimes.
Excellent. Excellent all with great customization, and very sleek. Only issue is some crashes
Awesome Well organised. Very good quality, never crashes and it's ad free. You can't beat that
Shuffle freezes on me It freezes randomly
Crashes. Started crashing again...
Great App Fresh UI, lots of feature, but sometimes the app crash.
Brilliant Crashes rarely. It's wonderful. Pleasant UI
great app, unfortunately it keeps crashing on marshmallow :/
Crashes frequently

Perfect!! It's exactly what I was looking for. Lock screen album art remover, customizable settings and appearance... My only complain is about the amount of crashes and bugs it has lately, it drives me crazy! Fix that and I'll give a million stars Thank you :) · LG G2 ·

Was great till now... I absolutely love this music player but ever since the update I can't even get it to play one song without crashing. Even when the app isnt open, it constantly crashes to the point of annoyance. Please fix this!
Keeps on crashing Almost perfect, except after the update it keeps on crashing. Huh...
Crashes constantly after update Always crashing randomly now.

One annoying lag Annoying lag: when we swipe songs very fast in playing mode the swyping lags and freezes a lot which is not acceptable. All other players including stock ones do not have this issue. Could you please fix it?

Was good before Before the last update the app was very good now it crash alot whenever you do a thing. It will crash when changeing the theme make a playlist and you can't modfiy your playlist or change artwork. I wish that you can slove this because it was a good app before.

Decent but room for improvement.
Best music app out there as far I'm concerned but the gapless playback needs some work and I dont understand why I have to restart a playlist from scratch if I add something I didn't mean to add to a playlist because you can't remove songs from playlists. Also the new update is really glitchy and crashes often and is laggy too. The new interface design is fine aesthetically.

Droid turbo - skipping & crashing
It says version 1.5.9 has fixed this issue but it is still happening. This is a 5 star app hands down, but this needs to be fixed to get it back to 5 stars... I've had this a long time and I love it... This issue just needs to be fixed and I will change it to 5 stars.... Update - 9/29 - this issue is becoming more and more troublesome.. Freezing, crashing, have to skip a sing each time... Please fix.. This app was the best before these issues.. All others really suck
Sucks Occasionally skips or replays songs even when shuffle and repeat is not on. Also randomly crashes frequently. Tried reinstalling but it still keeps doing it. Do not recommend.

Crashes, poor design. Ripoff
I paid for the plus version to play folders, but the app hangs when i try to play files. The ui is not intuitive, i cant understand if its playing or not. No "play" button.. Its very poorly designed i can not believe it has 1m downloads. Plus it doesn't even show that i purchased the plus version on the app store. I tried refunding it, but it was classified as an in app purchase so there's no easy way.
BUGS Frequently crashes at the end of songs. This would be the best music app if it weren't so buggy, but its inability to play music is annoying.
I like it, but its been crashing a lot lately It never happened before, might be due to the new version...
Sometimes crashes Its also doesn't let me rearrange my music in my playlists. Plz fix

Great player... Some minor bugs
I was searching for an alternative to Google play music... I found this player better than play music... A few bugs are present in the app... The app is quite a memory hog.. Runs 5 main processes while playing music.. Also scrolling in the Playlist is really not great... It like freezes after one scroll and the next scroll attempt fails... Other than really great app... Keep up the great work.!
Better I'm happy that this app is better then Google Play. That app has a problem with all of my music on my SD card and kept crashing. Thanks for a great app.
Crash App crashes everytime i press play through the widget.

Beautiful but Buggy It's gorgeous, customizable, and fluid to use, but it crashes and fails to start 2 out of every 3 times I try to launch it. Also it won't find any of my Google play music, is it possible to fix that? *Edit: the app also crashes when I click any lockscreen controls.*

I love it
It's my main music player, but recently it started to bug out. What would happen is I would be listening to my music and browsing my library, when it would crash. However the music would not stop playing, even after the song ended, so i would end up having to restart my phone unless I decided i wanted to listen to two songs at once. I could find no way of stopping the song other than restarting the phone.
The widget Every time I play a song on the widget it freezes for a few minutes and it happends every time I use the widget and I have the app open all the time and not use the widget
Lovely Crashes consistently when surfing Tumblr on Firefox, otherwise small and good.
Would rate it 5 once they fix the song skipping issue and also for some reason crashes when I try to change songs

Beautifully made First music app I download that does what's expected of of it. The only problem is the artwork sometimes doesn't load when I download it other than that minimal crashing. Bugs fixed smooth

Keeps crashing. I downloaded this music player and upgraded it to pro to replace my current one. Hoped it would be better but I see I will have to stick with my older one because it doesn't crash every 3 songs. I really like the interface and themes and organization but the crashing is terrible.

Crashing after update
It has a widget for my LG g3 circle case, and it worked fine before the update. And now after the update a every time I press it, it crashes the app, and I have to force close it. It almost a month later still no response from company about this. Going to have to delete it because it forces close on every tap with the LG G3 circle case.
Needs some small fixes Great app, just some small problems. My biggest gripe is that there is no 5x5 widget. It also crashes occasionally.
Good but bother me When i try to open a song it crashes me oftenly, please fix it. I dont mind too much but it bother so much
Not working Its installing but hang hoke band ho raha he, still crashed
Next song preloading Please add next song preloading. Also, UI freezes while the track changes.
Bug Every two songs i play. The app always freeze and crash. Please fix this

Latest update causes crashes After the latest update my One Plus running Oxygen cannot use the shuttle app as it crashes on all lengths of music after 30 seconds or less. It makes no difference if the media is paused the app still crashes.

Almost perfect The recent updates were suppose to fix crashes and bugs in the app, but some seem to be present even after the update. Sometimes the app will pause unknowingly in the middle of a song or stop working completely. As an app, this app is great, but the pauses and stops are irritating.

Terrible Very bad the app crashes every time I tap on a song ,fix this cause its a real big issue also you could have avoided yellow color for fonts and icons its terrible to look and irritates me very much. (light green would be better)
Love it so much! But as of late, it's been crashing constantly for seemingly no reason! I'm on a first gen moto g, and its unbearable. Please fix soon

This is for music lovers!!
This app is awesome! Much better than Google music. A problem is that the album art is giving some trouble in terms of the photo being pixelated for certain albums. Please fix and something I look forward to seeing is a really nice lock screen control widget. Something like poweramp's but better. And the stability is poor it crashes every now and again. Fix these two problems and improve the lock screen control and its perfect, I'll give you full stars. Keep up the good work!
Samsung S3 - Android 4.4.4 Latest update ruined the app. It crashes as soon as it is opened. Rebooting the device doesn't fix the problem. It used to be good, though.

Crash my music files
I had ever downloaded Shuttle on my old phone, it was a shock because many of my mp3 files were crashed, they sounded like canary bird "ck ck ck" . Exactly didn't know what really happened. Now I have a new phone, two days ago I downloaded Shuttle again because this music app made me in love , I expected that previous bug wouldn't happen again but It was really wrong. It's still the same problems appears. Several musics became corrupted again. I started to believe that Shuttle is the culprit of those mess
Emotions turned off Still freezes on random tracks. Doesn't recognise some tags. Doesn't download covers and shows unproper ones from another files instead. Unusable.
Keeps crashing Awesome player, but keeps crashing when I put the app on background or randomly. Please fix it
Killed my Dolby Audio Setting This app disabled my Dolby Audio Setting and crashed it. Had to make a Factory Reset to solve the issue on Lenovo A6000. HORRIBLE APP THIS IS
Great interface, but crashes with CM 5.11 and wma on SDCARD. Not stable!
Not perfect but good This app is not up to the mark but quite good, it doesn't crash itself so its kinda good
Crashes on play This app has issues tagging album artworks and crashes when u play a song
Still needs more fixing on crashes and the skip feature and also needs to allow more song formats to play
What the heck This player is so unstable and crashed very often on my quad core CPU phone it is extremely lady just improve stability because I'm starting to love this
Amazing By far the best player out there. Great graphics, works with Android wear perfectly, no crashes in 2 months of use.
Thanks for hearing me It stoped crashing
It crashes when I try to play a song
Still it crashes sometimes

Best player ever
I am really enthusiastic! This is the best player, in my honest opinion, in terms of reliability and stability! I do use it intensively and, despite of the elderly device, its performance drive me crazy. I've experienced not a single crash in 6 months. Last but not least, its material redesign in lovely. Well done!

great music app (but) there seems to be a bug that constantly force crashes the app if it's playing in the background while I have chrome open. other than that the in-app shuttle+ upgrade is a beautiful theme addition. hope to see this resolved but keep up the great work.

Great Player except... It's crashing! It keeps crashing for songs without album art. I have to restart my phone (LG Tribute) in order for it to work again! This is a five star app, and if the dev can fix this it'll get a five star review from me.

Please fix crashes I have to reinstall this app for the second time now, its the best music player I've ever used but it keeps giving me 'unfortunately shuttle has stopped' after a few days of reinstalling. Please fix!
Its a 5 star app with a bug or two here or there. Lots of features. Sort by album year is really useful for me. Crashed upon accidentally clicking shuffle all as I have alot of music.

Updated, but crashing has gotten worse!!! Ever since the update, it continues crashing every 2-3 minutes! Before the update it was alright, but I guess I'm going to have to uninstall until then, it was such a great app too
It's crashing! It's crashing every time I play a music. I hope you could fix this coz I really like this App.
Crashed Crashed everytime i open it. Please fix it. Its a nice player, I am willing to use it but it crashes after every second track. Upset and Disappointed.

Great music player
I think this a great music player and would be worth 5 stars, but the music player crashes a lot when I use google chrome. If this gets fixed, I would gladly give 5 stars. A feature I would much appreciate being added is the ability to pick random play instead of shuffle play, so that a song can be played more than once when shuffle is on.

Pretty design... Good job on the design, very pretty and very easy to use. I'm on Chroma with my Nexus 6, and I am experiencing some crashes at times. I can probably try doing a logcat next time that happens. ^^
COULD be perfect Shuttle does a lot of things well it has an amazing user interface and being able to download artwork is great but uses way to much ram and crashes if you pick a new song to often
Gets better with each version! No doubt this is the best looking music player out there on the play store! Could do with a few crash fixes though....
Great function but crashes a lot Has great features but crashes a lot. Not sure if my device ZTE ZMAX but unusable with all the crashes.

Decent The Shuttle music player is a good one but the APP lags and also crashes whenever I press the like (heart shaped) button I don't know why. Also one additional feature could be the support for previous track by pressing the button thrice in the earphone controller.

Still freezes sometimes It still freezes while changing from one tab to another or one song to another.. and I think that it's become too much colorful now..bring back the same old UI with crashes fixed..

GREAT BUT This app is packed with a lot of great feaures BUT what I REALLY HATE is that it lags my phone big time to the extent that I have to turn off my phone to exit the app because it makes my phone freeze!!!! Please fix this immediately
I have an LG Tribute. I really love this app, but it keeps crashing for me! The app worked for awhile, but now it crashes every couple of songs! Help?

Crashes It's the best music app I've seen with its features and the overall look of it is is just awesome but it crashes a lot as I come out of it sometimes it crashes when I lock my screen it crashes it's awesome but it crashes
S4 Plays one song and then the app freezes. Love the design and the feel of the app, would buy it if there was no freezes.
It's really awesome! But: it crashes too often, and it'd be really great if you added automatic lyrics to the app.

DON'T WORK!!! After MANY attempts to do something, this app would freeze and I had to shut down my freaking tablet. I do not want anyone to think I am mean I am 10. (I know I thought it was crappy, doesn't mean it is. So, get the app if you want to :)
Shuttle music player This upgrade crashes part way through songs. It has a terribly long lag between forwarding to next song. I am removing upgrade!
Really Wanna Like It Keeps crashing after about 2 songs when my screen is off..... Wanna keep using it but really can't if this always happens. Please help
Crashes Every time i tried to open the app, it keeps on force closing on itself. It's frustrating knowing that i can't play my music.
Crashing! Keeps crashing! After a few songs, it just stops and I have force stop it so it could work again! Whyyy
Best music player Good performance it's customisable, easy to use. New update freezes regularly though
Crashes After the new update the app crashes when I disconnect a Bluetooth speaker and try to plug in headphones again.
High memory usage Only problem seems like the high memory usage, it goes up to 300 MB, and it causes app to crash.
Crash It's good, and I pretty like it, but the app is dosen't work since I download the update. I hope will be good coming soon.
Crash reports! Its crashing like hell!! I mean I play a song and then open up the internet and within 30 secs it crashes! *bugs* fix it!!!.
New update messed up album art a bit, few crashes and random shut down
Crashes crashes crashes I like shuttle a lot but It keeps on crashing fix it plez
Crashes constantly I can't even open it without it crashing after the new update
Crashes too much Crashes approximately every 5-7 songs. Only fix is to reboot the phone. Fix this issue.
Bugs Keeps crashing, and the wire control from my earphone doesn't work
Worked alright one day and then.. Keeps crashing on my HTC sv
I can't even play a song without out just crashing
Crashes Even after updating the app it keeps on crashing
Great potential wasted by the fact that it crashes every 10 minutes.
Use to love it It crash a lot lately
Latest version still crashes all of the time
Better than the stock player Better than the stock player but it keeps crashing after the updates
Crashes Still crashes when opening it
keeps crashing after update
Really simple and a great UI Sleek and useful design.Has themes,doesn't crash and has multifunctional UI
Keeps crashing !
GREAT.. ..nice UI and design but crash sometimes..
Keeps Crashing
Crashing sucks

Alphabetization For some reason my songs aren't properly alphabetized.. Its a little annoying to find the song and I have to search for it, but when I do, it crashes. Other than that better than google play music.

Songs not in alphabetical order Ever since the update the list of songs is completely random, I could have songs we that start with a L and find them in the N section. Although it does not crash, this is an annoyance. It also does not allow me to look up songs as well.

Solid app Still crashes when I use it in the background with bigger apps like Google maps navigation or multiple apps in the background. Very very annoying, because it freezes basically your whole phone when this happens. I like it otherwise. Simple and easy.

Great music app.... Good looking and outstanding...
Please. Fix all crash bugs and add 'go to artist ' n 'go to album' options and a lyrics downloader, similar artist to the now playing artist and lots more......and I would to suggest that the blurred and a little bit darkened artist image should be displayed on the now playing screen only on the landscape mode with the album cover and the controls above it... I think that will add to the beauty and functionality of the app... Holla from Nigeria

Crashes in moto g second gen it crashes when multi tasking and it doesn't show album art when connected to wifi.. idk if its my settings but i have cheaked it though. need to these bugs otherwise its good.

Crashing when choosing track When opening a song, an app crashes(D802-Lollipop). Strangely, when open song from file explorer with Shuttle everything works as it should. 4 star cause developer said that bugs are being polished. Overall, really good music player as lollipop option

One of the best but...
This is my absolute favourite music app. Google play music is unnecessarily complex, I just wanna get to my music and listen and this app let's me do that without extra steps. The biggest issue I'm having with it is that after I listen to a song sometimes it won't go on and play the next one and then it just crashes. Now I'm using my default music player, which I also hate, because of the app stopping after a song. Please fix this problem cause I want to use this app again!
Keeps crashing. I absolutely love this music player, and it worked fine for a while. But then it started crashing constantly. Every time I start it up, it stops working and it's quite upsetting.

equaliser crashes
It would be a decent app if the equaliser didnt constantly crash. I select a custom equaliser setting and the app runs fine for a few songs, but at the start of the next track the equaliser crashes and reverts back to normal setting and you can't change the equaliser setting until you restart the app.

Good first impression, but crashes often Really like this app. Good UI, good features, big display for album art. But it crashes frequently and even prevents the home screen from appearing when player is on and screen dims. Please fix.

Not so good any more...
Earlier it used to work well, but since the Lolipop theme update, it has various problems. Sometimes the EQ doesn't respond, or after a few seconds the lockscreen commands don't work. In the recent update, the app started to crash. Emailing the developer is useless as he keeps on saying that it is the fault of the Android OS, or any custom ROM that you have installed. Used this app for around 3 years, and finally started thinking about going back to Rocket. Also, don't even think about using the dark theme.

Almost Perfect
I love everything about this app, especially the layout. My only problem is that it tends to crash quite a bit. It will crash randomly, then when I try to open it again it crashes the second I go into a song. I'll still be patient... for now
I really do like the way Shuttle is laid out. It's clean and simple. I like that it gets rid of the gaps in between song & finds album covers as well as artists' photos although not all. My main concerns are the amount of crashes I get on a daily basis, after selecting a song, skipping a track, or even skipping too many tracks at a time. Some others that bother my experience is that after a playlist finishes shuffling and I try to replay the list, it only plays one track at time and when using my bluetooth headphones I can never go back to a previous track. The back button doesn't even show in the notifications tab. I'm still willing to be patient, but it is wearing thin.

Testing
Just downloaded and testing. At first blush, the GUI is far superior to the app that came with my phone. Lots of usable settings. Search feature awesome. Genre category is really worthless. Haven't found a way to edit tags. Size of app a bit bulky. All in all, still vastly superior to what I have been using. Deleted song, it appears in Recent, tap that song, app crashes. Used PL in car 10/1/13, outstanding performance. It could use a func 2 find dups. Func of pausing when BT disconnects is excellent.
Perfect. Excellent work! Simple and straightforward, yet still does everything. Ability to change font size would be sooper cool... App crashes lots after a couple months.

Few problems Overall, I love the layout of the app and the numerous settings options. Normally it runs rather smoothly--but often it freezes and stops playing. The app needs to be restarted to resolve this problem, and that's my only qualm. Other than that, great app!

I really wish I could recommend this but it needs a lot of polish. Nexus 4)

Works well
Overall it is pretty solid, good features, interface looks nice, I would have given it 5/5 if it weren't for one bug. If you have a file type with a supported extension, but the encoding isn't supported, the song will get skipped, which is OK. If it is part of a playlist though, it gets skipped, and then you can't skip to any song before that. If you try to skip back over repeatedly, the app crashes. Not really a big deal for me, but notice it sometimes

I uninstalled this app after about five months of use. It is glitchy -- freezes up, won't shuffle even when shuffle is turned on, and, a few times, would only play one song no matter how many times I tried to skip it.
